pr_title: Log information about topic partitions seeing events outside alternative SLA in the EventProducer

timeline.message: Add the ability to log information about topic partitions seeing events outside alternative SLA in the EventProducer

timeline.author: DEEPTHIKORAT

replies.bodyText: good catch 🤣somehow my brain deduped the two words into one
replies.author: somandal

timeline.bodyText: is the move inside of _logger.isDebugEnabled() intentional?
timeline.author: DEEPTHIKORAT

replies.bodyText: this is not within the if block, the diff just swallowed the rest of the if block.
replies.author: somandal

replies.bodyText: Ah sorry, got confused with the indent.
replies.author: DEEPTHIKORAT

timeline.bodyText: Why do we need this special class when kafka has TopicPartition class?
timeline.author: DEEPTHIKORAT

replies.bodyText: yeah, was debating whether to add a dependency on kafka or not for this module so I implemented my own. But you're right, it's just silly code duplication. I'll fix this to use Kafka's TopicPartition.
replies.author: somandal

timeline.author: ahmedahamid
